price: Allah arabannyega (aburizamo umugambi wabo), akanabarekera mu kwigomeka kwabo barindagira.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَسۡتَهۡزِئُ بِهِمۡ وَيَمُدُّهُمۡ فِي طُغۡيَٰنِهِمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu yastahzi-u bihim wayamudduhum fī ṭugh'yānihim yaʿmahūna
